seo: CVE-2024-45388, Hoverfly, 任意文件读取漏洞, 漏洞检测, 安全漏洞
seo_en: CVE-2024-45388, Hoverfly, Arbitrary File Read, Vulnerability Detection, Security Flaw
summary: 该插件用于检测Hoverfly服务中的任意文件读取漏洞，攻击者可利用此漏洞从服务器读取任意文件，导致敏感信息泄露。
summary_en: This plugin detects an arbitrary file read vulnerability in Hoverfly service. An attacker can exploit this flaw to read any file from the server, leading to sensitive information leakage.
